analysis.description:
FiatCappedCrowdsale.millRaised (/unique_chucks/41/0xbffafb9efcee04ce93553bcec7f5599488923c83.sol#312-313) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- capReached (/unique_chucks/41/0xbffafb9efcee04ce93553bcec7f5599488923c83.sol#376-378)
empty in RestrictedToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/41/0xbffafb9efcee04ce93553bcec7f5599488923c83.sol#626) is a local variable never initialiazed

PrivatePreSale._processPurchaseInWei (/unique_chucks/41/0xbffafb9efcee04ce93553bcec7f5599488923c83.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenR0.issue(_beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/41/0xbffafb9efcee04ce93553bcec7f5599488923c83.sol)
	-tokenR6.issue(_beneficiary,bonus) (/unique_chucks/41/0xbffafb9efcee04ce93553bcec7f5599488923c83.sol)
	-tokenR6.issue(_beneficiary,tokens.add(bonus)) (/unique_chucks/41/0xbffafb9efcee04ce93553bcec7f5599488923c83.sol)

Reentrancy in RestrictedToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/41/0xbffafb9efcee04ce93553bcec7f5599488923c83.sol#617-628):
	External calls:
	- receiver.tokenFallback(msg.sender,_value,empty) (/unique_chucks/41/0xbffafb9efcee04ce93553bcec7f5599488923c83.sol#627)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/41/0xbffafb9efcee04ce93553bcec7f5599488923c83.sol#627-628)
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/41/0xbffafb9efcee04ce93553bcec7f5599488923c83.sol#217-220) should be declared external
